paper_abstract: This paper deals with the extended Pouzet-Runge-Kutta methods for nonlinear neutral delay-integro-differential equations. Nonlinear stability and numerical implementation of the methods are investigated. It is proven under the suitable conditions that the extended Pouzet-Runge-Kutta methods are globally and asymptotically stable for problems of the class NRI(alpha, beta, gamma, nu). Numerical examples further illustrate the theoretical results and the methods' effectiveness.
paper_title: The extended Pouzet-Runge-Kutta methods for nonlinear neutral delay-integro-differential equations
